messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] FLORIDA?
messages.msgSnippet: We re in Tampa--a bit far from you, I guess. But it s good to know there are some unschoolers in Florida! Mary
messages.messageBody:
We're in Tampa--a bit far from you, I guess. But it's good to know there are some
unschoolers in Florida!

Mary


On 16 Nov 2004 at 21:34, Heidi Here wrote:

>
> Any unschoolers in central Florida? Im in Eustis and I do not know any
> unschoolers.
> Heidi
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Genant2@...
> To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 2004 7:20 PM
> Subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5032
>
>
> In a message dated 11/16/2004 6:40:39 PM Eastern Standard Time,
> UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
>
> Anyone here who doubts that should order some back issues of Home School
> Digest or The Old Schoolhouse. They WANT their children separate, they
> WANT them
> to think that everything outside their protected little world is the
> imminent
> destruction by and of Satan and that the children's only salvation is
> isolation.<<<<<<
>
> Or you can come visit me for a few weeks. There are lots of homeschoolers
> here that won't let their children play with mine.
> Pam G

messages.subject: Re: FLORIDA?
messages.msgSnippet: I live in Lake County Florida, Paisley, about 30 minutes from Eustis.  I am new to unschooling and would love to meet you. Like you, I know no other
messages.messageBody:
I live in Lake County Florida, Paisley, about 30 minutes from
Eustis. I am new to unschooling and would love to meet you. Like
you, I know no other unschoolers here. I have a 10 y/o son. We
are both excited to be able to unschool, as we hate rules. Hope to
see you soon, Carolyn & Zachary


"Heidi Here" <kleincrew@p...> wrote:
>
> Any unschoolers in central Florida? Im in Eustis and I do not know
any unschoolers.
> Heidi

]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] FLORIDA?
messages.msgSnippet: Any unschoolers in central Florida? Im in Eustis and I do not know any unschoolers. Heidi ... From: Genant2@aol.com To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
Any unschoolers in central Florida? Im in Eustis and I do not know any unschoolers.
Heidi
----- Original Message -----
From: Genant2@...
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 2004 7:20 PM
Subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 5032


In a message dated 11/16/2004 6:40:39 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

Anyone here who doubts that should order some back issues of Home School
Digest or The Old Schoolhouse. They WANT their children separate, they
WANT them
to think that everything outside their protected little world is the
imminent
destruction by and of Satan and that the children's only salvation is
isolation.<<<<<<

Or you can come visit me for a few weeks. There are lots of homeschoolers
here that won't let their children play with mine.
Pam G
